name: self-hosted-debrid
description: Self-hosted P2P torrent streaming service for Stremio and MediaFusion - a complete Real-Debrid alternative

BASE_URL.description: Base URL of your deployed app (e.g., https://your-app-name.herokuapp.com) - IMPORTANT: Update this after deployment with your actual Heroku app URL

AUTH_TOKEN.description: Optional authentication token for API access. If set, all requests must include this token via Authorization header or ?token= query param. Leave empty to disable authentication.

TORRENT_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in milliseconds for torrent metadata fetching (default: 300000 = 5 minutes)

MAX_TORRENTS.description: Maximum number of concurrent torrents to keep in memory (default: 10)

DOWNLOAD_PATH.description: Path for temporary torrent data (default: ./tmp/torrents). Note: Heroku has ephemeral filesystem.

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Deployment successful! Remember to update BASE_URL env var with your actual Heroku app URL.'
